translation.en: Would you like to see before, you know...
translation.it: Vuoi vedere il corpo prima di...

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.it: Sì.

translation.en: Brian? Who's this?
translation.it: Brian? Chi è questo?

translation.en: You know, I asked myself the same thing when my dad passed.
translation.it: Mi chiesi la stessa cosa quando morì mio padre.

translation.en: I said, "Who is this man?"
translation.it: "Chi è quest'uomo?"

translation.en: No, no, Brian. Who's this in the coffin?
translation.it: No, Brian. Chi è questo nella bara?

translation.en: -Because that's not my father. -Are you sure?
translation.it: Non è mio padre. Sei sicuro?

translation.en: Are you asking me if I'm sure I know what my father looks like?
translation.it: Pensi non sappia com'è fatto mio padre?

translation.en: No, people make mistakes in a time of grief, Aaron.
translation.it: Quando si soffre, si può sbagliare.

translation.en: Look at the damn body, man.
translation.it: Guarda questo dannato cadavere.

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.it: Oh, merda.

translation.en: -You got Jackie Chan in there! -Okay, listen...
translation.it: - C'è Jackie Chan qui dentro! - Ascolta...

translation.en: Come on, Brian. You know what my father looks like.
translation.it: Brian. Lo sai che aspetto ha mio padre.

translation.en: We are very scattered today. This type of thing almost never happens.
translation.it: È stata una giornataccia. Questo non capita quasi mai.

translation.en: -Almost never happens? -I said that out loud?
translation.it: - Quasi mai? - L'ho detto ad alta voce?

translation.en: It's not Burger King. You can't just mess up my order.
translation.it: Non è Burger King. Non puoi sbagliare l'ordine.

translation.en: Please, just calm down. I think I know where he is.
translation.it: Calma. Penso di sapere dov'é.

translation.en: You think?
translation.it: Pensi?

translation.en: If my dad's not in this coffin in one hour, then you have to take his place.
translation.it: Se mio padre non è nella bara entro un'ora... ...prenderai il suo posto. Ok?

translation.en: -You got it? -Don't worry. I'll get him back.
translation.it: ...prenderai il suo posto. Ok? Non preoccuparti. Lo recupereremo. Prometto.

translation.en: I promise that. He's in one of two places. I think it's the second place.
translation.it: Non preoccuparti. Lo recupereremo. Prometto. Può essere in due posti. Penso sia nel secondo.

translation.en: Listen, okay, guys? Let's pack this up. Close this.
translation.it: Ascoltate, ragazzi. Chiudiamo tutto.

translation.en: Let's go, let's get out of here.
translation.it: Andiamocene da qui.

translation.en: Wait a minute, before we move... Okay. Did I give you my keys?
translation.it: Aspetta, prima che ce ne andiamo... Ho dato a te le chiavi?

translation.en: No. They in the car. I left the damn keys in the car.
translation.it: No. Sono in macchina. Le ho lasciate in macchina.

translation.en: Let's go, guys. I think it's on.
translation.it: Andiamo, ragazzi. Tutto a posto.

translation.en: If you're so antsy about being here, why'd you come out in the first place?
translation.it: Se sei cosi a disagio, perché sei venuto?

translation.en: -You know why. -I hate funerals.
translation.it: - Lo sai perché. - Odio i funerali.

translation.en: All about death, death, death.
translation.it: Si parla solo di morte, morte.

translation.en: I don't think funerals are designed for anybody to like, Norman.
translation.it: Non penso che possano piacere a qualcuno, Norman.

translation.en: I suppose.
translation.it: Immagino di sì.

translation.en: I don't want a regular funeral when it's my time to go, you know.
translation.it: Per me non voglio un funerale normale.

translation.en: I want my life celebrated.
translation.it: Voglio che sia celebrata la mia vita.

translation.en: Like Anna Nicole Smith, Richard Nixon, somebody big and powerful.
translation.it: Come Anna Nicole Smith, Richard Nixon, qualcuno grande e potente.

translation.en: I want mine to be the saddest day ever.
translation.it: Io vorrei fosse un giorno terribile.

translation.en: Stock market should crash, factories shut down,
translation.it: La borsa dovrebbe crollare, le industrie chiudere...

translation.en: girls crying in the streets.
translation.it: ...e le ragazze piangere in strada. Roba cosi.

translation.en: That kind of thing. An eclipse would be nice.
translation.it: ...e le ragazze piangere in strada. Roba cosi. Un'eclissi non sarebbe male.

translation.en: -Come on. -What?
translation.it: - Ma dai. - Cosa?

translation.en: You still smoking after all of those warnings and stuff out there?

translation.en: No, Norman, stop, all right. You used to smoke.
translation.it: Norman, smettila. Fumavi anche tu. Fumavamo insieme.

translation.en: We used to smoke together.
translation.it: Fumavi anche tu. Fumavamo insieme.

translation.en: I used to piss my pants and then I stopped.
translation.it: Una volta me la facevo sotto, ma ho smesso.

translation.en: I got my own problems to worry about without worrying about your damn smoking.
translation.it: Ho già i miei problemi, non farmi preoccupare per te.

translation.en: Come on, Norman. What problems you got, man?
translation.it: Dai, Norman. Che problemi hai?

translation.en: -I told you! My rash! -Got to use condoms, papa.
translation.it: - Te l'ho detto! Lo sfogo! - Usa il preservativo.

translation.en: -On my hand, dude. -You still have to use a condom, Norman.
translation.it: È sulla mano. Devi comunque usarlo. È la prima linea di difesa.

translation.en: That's the first line of defense.
translation.it: Devi comunque usarlo. È la prima linea di difesa.

translation.en: This shit ain't normal. Look at it.
translation.it: Non è normale. Guarda.

translation.en: -Fuck. That ain't a rash, man. -What you think it is?
translation.it: - Cazzo. Non è uno sfogo. - E che cos'é?

translation.en: I don't know, but it's very splotchy.
translation.it: Non lo so, ma è pieno di macchie.

translation.en: Splotchy? I hate splotchy. I'm gonna pass away, I'm gonna die!
translation.it: Macchie? Odio le macchie. Sto per morire!

translation.en: -Nah. -And I'm so damn young!
translation.it: - No. - Sono cosi giovane!

translation.en: They brought the wrong body.
translation.it: Hanno portato il cadavere sbagliato.

translation.en: Honey, did you hear me? They brought the wrong body.
translation.it: Tesoro, hai sentito? Hanno sbagliato cadavere.

translation.en: Oh, my God! Well, do they know where he is?
translation.it: Oh, mio Dio! Ma sanno dov'è?

translation.en: They think so.
translation.it: Pensano di sì.

translation.en: I told you. I told you not to use the Marshalls,
translation.it: Ti avevo detto di non chiamare i Marshall...

translation.en: but, no, you wanted to keep it all in the neighborhood.
translation.it: ...ma volevi usare una ditta di zona.

translation.en: Don't rub it in, not today. I got too much to worry about.
translation.it: Lascia perdere, almeno oggi. Ho troppe cose a cui pensare.

translation.en: Dad insisted on having his funeral at home, so now I just can't escape it.
translation.it: Papà insisteva per il funerale a casa e quindi non posso evitarlo.

translation.en: Death is everywhere.

translation.en: Baby, no. No, it's not.
translation.it: Tesoro, no. Non lo è.

translation.en: Mom won't stop crying.
translation.it: La mamma continua a piangere.

translation.en: -Ryan hasn't helped out. -Not like he ever does.
translation.it: - Ryan non è d'aiuto. - Non lo è mai.

translation.en: Plus on top of that, I got to worry about this whole eulogy thing.
translation.it: Oltretutto c'è l'elogio funebre.

translation.en: I am sure it'll be the best eulogy anybody's ever heard.
translation.it: Sarà il miglior elogio che avranno mai sentito.

translation.en: Doesn't matter.

translation.en: All anybody's gonna be thinking is, "Why isn't Ryan doing the eulogy?
translation.it: Penseranno solo: "Perché l'elogio non lo fa Ryan?"

translation.en: "Step aside and let the writer say a few words."
translation.it: "Lascia parlare lo scrittore."

translation.en: Even I'm gonna be thinking it.
translation.it: Lo penserò perfino io.

translation.en: Why don't you just let him do it then?
translation.it: Allora perché non lo fai fare a lui?

translation.en: So, now you want Ryan to do the eulogy?

translation.en: No. I'm just saying...
translation.it: No, dico solo...

translation.en: You're just saying that you wanna hear Ryan's eulogy.
translation.it: Che vuoi sentire l'elogio di Ryan.

translation.en: No. You're the oldest, so...
translation.it: No. Tu sei il più vecchio e...

translation.en: So, the only reason I should do it is because I'm old.

translation.en: Aaron, calm down.
translation.it: Aaron, calmati.

translation.en: I think that you are every bit as good a writer as your brother.
translation.it: Penso che tu scriva bene quanto tuo fratello.

translation.en: I just think that you need to let someone actually read your book.
translation.it: Dovresti solamente permettere a qualcuno di leggere il tuo libro.

translation.en: It's not ready yet.
translation.it: Non è ancora pronto.

translation.en: Okay, fine. But don't forget, we close on the house next week.
translation.it: Ok. Ma la prossima settimana firmiamo per la casa.

translation.en: -I know. -I mean, I love your mom,

translation.en: but I am so ready to move.
translation.it: Voglio bene a tua madre, ma sono prontissima a trasferirmi.

translation.en: I know, honey, but we just got to get through today, okay?
translation.it: Lo so, ma dobbiamo solo superare questa giornata.

translation.en: Exactly.
translation.it: Esatto.

translation.en: I know this is rough.
translation.it: So che è dura.

translation.en: But it's the last day of my cycle.

translation.en: And I'm 37 years old, so we need to try to,

translation.en: you know, we need to do it, at least once today, okay?

translation.en: -Babe. -Yeah?
translation.it: - Amore. - Cosa?

translation.en: You're gonna have to switch that cycle down to low for now, just for now.

translation.en: -Are you okay? -Yeah, absolutely.

translation.en: Okay, I'm a... I'm a little nervous.

translation.en: Why, because you're gonna see my dad again?

translation.en: I just don't think I've ever been so openly hated by anyone before.

translation.en: Even my seventh graders aren't that mean.

translation.en: I think he's gonna be more concerned today that his brother just died than be...

translation.en: -Babe. -I'm sorry, baby. It's the traffic.

translation.en: Right. Anyway, when I tell him that we're getting married,
translation.it: Comunque, quando gli dirò che ci sposiamo...

translation.en: he's just gonna have to accept you. I...
translation.it: ...dovrà accettarti. Io...

translation.en: -Jesus! Are you okay? -Oh, my God.
translation.it: - Cristo! Stai bene? - Oddio.

translation.en: -You asshole! -Fuck you, bitch.
translation.it: - Stronzo! - Puttana.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, flip me off. Can't you see there's a traffic jam?

translation.en: You poke your eye out, your father's gonna kill me.

translation.en: -Oscar, baby. -Yes.
translation.it: - Oscar, tesoro. - Sì.

translation.en: -Look at me. -Okay.

translation.en: -Relax. Okay? -All right.

translation.en: Everything is fine. Okay? Breathe.

translation.en: Okay.
translation.it: D'accordo.

translation.en: -Better? -Better.

translation.en: Oh, good. It's okay.
translation.it: Bene. È tutto a posto.

translation.en: Fuck you!

translation.en: I think you'll find that everything is in perfect order.

translation.en: Oh, so, now you wanna be professional.

translation.en: You got your keys? You got your BlackBerry?

translation.en: Because once we bury him, we not gonna dig him back up

translation.en: just so you can tweet.
translation.it: ...per farti tweettare.

translation.en: Look, I'm trying, okay?

translation.en: Hey, how is your mother holding up, Aaron?

translation.en: She's fine. She's in great health.

translation.en: -There's no more business here. -Good.

translation.en: What about your Uncle Russell? He wasn't doing that well.

translation.en: -How's he doing? -Bye. Okay, I'm just asking. It's conversation, that's all.

translation.en: I'm here if you need me, you know that. Thank you for everything.

translation.en: -Michelle, come here. -Bye, Brian.
translation.it: - Michelle vieni. - Ciao Brian.

translation.en: You don't have to come.

translation.en: I'm just saying, everybody knows that the Colonel stole that recipe
translation.it: Lo sanno tutti... ...che il Colonnello rubò la ricetta del pollo fritto...

translation.en: for fried chicken from a slave named Jubalai.
translation.it: ...che il Colonnello rubò la ricetta del pollo fritto... ...ad uno schiavo di nome Jubalai.

translation.en: Now, I give him credit for the coleslaw, but that's it.

translation.en: Yeah, I know it's a hassle, but you're the closest.

translation.en: All right, I'll do it.

translation.it: Andare in Australia e in Cina. Voleva andare in Thailandia.

translation.en: Oh, come on, Ma, you're not gonna fly 25 hours.
translation.it: Dai, mamma, non avresti volato 25 ore

translation.en: Who knows how long I'm gonna live without him?

translation.en: You got to know how to handle him.

translation.en: I came to pick you up and take you to the funeral.

translation.en: Shit, good thing you know how to handle him.

translation.en: Stop the game, all right?

translation.en: -Listen. -Yes, the pills. I have them.
translation.it: - Ascolta. - Ho le pillole.

translation.en: You'll love it. All right, got to go. Bye.

translation.en: -Hey, Mama. -Ryan, my baby!

translation.it: Mamma, so che è dura, ma si sistemerà tutto...

translation.it: ...che non hai mai parlato male...

translation.en: or held prejudice against any race, creed, gender,
translation.it: ...o avuto pregiudizi contro nessuna razza... ...credo, sesso...

translation.en: or height.
translation.it: ...o statura.

translation.en: And if I turn out to be just half the man that my father was,
translation.it: Se diventerò metà di ciò che è stato mio padre...

translation.en: then the child I'm planning on having with my beautiful wife
translation.it: ...il figlio che voglio avere con la mia bellissima moglie...

translation.en: will be truly blessed.
translation.it: ...sarà veramente fortunato.

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.it: Grazie.

translation.en: Well done, son.
translation.it: Ben detto, figliolo.

translation.en: It's gonna be good, boy.
translation.it: Andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: Good job.
translation.it: Bravo.

translation.en: Oscar, let's not do this again.
translation.it: Oscar, ora basta.

translation.en: I always thought he had a little sugar in his tank.
translation.it: Ho sempre pensato che fosse un po' "fru-fru".

translation.en: Hey, how's Mom holding up?
translation.it: Come sta la mamma?

translation.en: She's good. Resting.
translation.it: Bene. Si sta riposando.

translation.en: You know, it's gonna take a while for her to accept Dad was...
translation.it: Ci vorrà del tempo prima che accetti che papà era...

translation.en: You know.
translation.it: Lo so.

translation.en: She'll be okay.
translation.it: Starà bene.

translation.en: You know, that was a pretty good send-off you gave the old man. You wrote that?
translation.it: Hai detto delle bellissime cose. Ti eri scritto il discorso?

translation.en: Some guy I met told me I need to be spontaneous.
translation.it: Qualcuno mi ha detto che dovrei essere più spontaneo.

translation.en: Yeah, well, Dad would've been proud. I know I was.
translation.it: Papà sarebbe stato fiero. Io lo sono.

translation.en: Maybe when you're ready, you'll let me take a look at that novel of yours.
translation.it: Magari quando sei pronto, mi fai leggere quel tuo romanzo.

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.it: Te lo mando la settimana prossima.

translation.en: -Yeah, I'm gonna send it to you next week. -All right.
translation.it: Te lo mando la settimana prossima. D'accordo.

translation.en: -But you know Michelle gotta read it first. -Okay.
translation.it: Ma deve leggerlo prima Michelle.

translation.en: I'm not going through that again.
translation.it: Non voglio farla arrabbiare ancora.

translation.en: All right. Well, thanks, big bro.
translation.it: Va bene. Beh, grazie, fratellone.

translation.en: Sure you don't wanna stay another day?
translation.it: Sicuro che non vuoi restare ancora?

translation.en: Got a good Laker game coming up.
translation.it: C'è una bella partita dei Laker.

translation.en: -Your boy, Kobe. -No.
translation.it: - C'è il tuo eroe, Kobe. - No.

translation.en: I'd just be feeling sad or be in the way.
translation.it: Sarei triste o vi sarei d'impiccio.

translation.en: You know how it is. Probably gonna get on back.
translation.it: Sai com'è. Devo riprendermi.

translation.en: You know, do my thing. Still gotta grieve.
translation.it: Fare le mie cose. Sono ancora giù.

translation.en: Me, too.
translation.it: Anch'io.

translation.en: What? A brother's gotta get to the airport.
translation.it: Devo arrivarci in qualche modo all'aeroporto, no?

translation.en: Come on, you better make sure you don't go to jail first.
translation.it: Cerca di non finire prima in prigione.

translation.en: -Hey. -Ryan.
translation.it: - Ryan. - Cognatina.

translation.en: -Sis. -Baby, listen,
translation.it: Fatti vedere più spesso, d'accordo?

translation.en: -don't stay away so long next time, okay? -I sure won't. All right, bro.
translation.it: Fatti vedere più spesso, d'accordo? Certo. Va bene, fratello.

translation.en: Hey, next funeral.
translation.it: Al prossimo funerale.

translation.en: -Love you, man. -Love you, too, man.
translation.it: - Ti voglio bene. - Anch'io.

translation.en: Wow, I see he got his ride.
translation.it: Ha trovato un passaggio.

translation.en: Yeah. R. Kelly used the same car service.
translation.it: R. Kelly usava lo stesso servizio di noleggio con conducente.

translation.en: Just like candy.
translation.it: Come una caramella

translation.en: I am worn out. This has been a long day.
translation.it: Sono distrutta. È stata una lunga giornata.

translation.en: A long, long day.
translation.it: Una lunghissima giornata.

translation.en: -And guess what? -What?
translation.it: - E sai cosa? - Cosa?

translation.en: Now I'm interested.
translation.it: Ora sono interessato.

translation.en: No Mama. No guests. No Uncle Russell.
translation.it: Niente mamma. Niente ospiti. Niente zio Russell.

translation.en: -Where's Uncle Russell? -He's upstairs.
translation.it: - Dov'é zio Russel? - Di sopra.

translation.en: I gave him a couple Valium and put him to bed.
translation.it: Gli ho dato un paio di Valium e l'ho messo al letto.

translation.en: What?
translation.it: Cosa?

translation.en: Shit. Man.
translation.it: Cazzo.

translation.en: Everything's so fucking green.
translation.it: È tutto così verde, cazzo.
